HostelAdmissionNotice.title: NOTICE
HostelAdmissionNotice.for: All first-year UG, PG, and Dual Degree students of NIT Agartala and IIIT Agartala who wish to stay in the hostel.
feeNotes: ₹5000 is refundable after completion of the course.

specialInstructionsForGirls.priority: Due to limited vacancy in the girls’ hostel, girls whose home state is other than Tripura will be given priority.

paymentProcedure.description: Pay the one-time hostel initial fee (₹7000) through MIS account after physical reporting.
paymentProcedure.path: Login to MIS Account → Online Payment → SBI EPAY → Common Payment Interface → Select Receipt Type → Hostel Initial Fee → Pay

paymentProcedure.description: Submit the hostel fee (₹29645 for Double Occupancy and ₹30645 for Single Occupancy) through MIS account.
paymentProcedure.path: Login to MIS Account → Online Payment → SBI EPAY → Common Payment Interface → Select Receipt Type → Hostel Fee → Pay

paymentProcedure.description: Proceed to room allotment in the MIS.
paymentProcedure.path: Hostel → Transaction → Automatic Room Allotment → Allot Room

paymentProcedure.description: At the hostel office of RNT/Gargi Hostel, produce the soft copies of the receipts, the hostel room allotment letter, along with the filled hostel application form in hard copy.

additionalInfo.guestRoomFacility: No guest room facility for parents in the Hostel.
additionalInfo.boysHostelSeats: No limitation of seats; all interested students can take admission.
additionalInfo.loanAvailment: Those availing a loan must transfer fees using the individual VAN (Virtual Account Number) provided in the provisional admission letter.

rulesAndRegulations: Keep calm and quiet to maintain peace and harmony.
Keep the allotted room/floor/corridor/toilet neat and clean.
Only personal laptops without external speakers, mobile phones, and power banks are allowed. Use of other electrical appliances is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Ragging is strictly prohibited.
Fighting is a punishable offense (penalty ₹5000 per individual).
Cooking is not allowed inside hostel rooms (penalty ₹5000).
Using motor vehicles on campus is strictly prohibited.
Smoking/chewing tobacco/consumption of alcoholic drinks is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Taking articles/utensils from the mess is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Unauthorized accommodation for friends/visitors/relatives is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Photograph pasting/drawing/writing on walls/furniture is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Interchanging/altering allotted rooms without approval is prohibited (penalty ₹5000).
Do not write name/roll number on the room door.
Birthday celebrations inside the hostel room are strictly prohibited.
Hostellers are not allowed to be absent from the hostel at night without permission.
Using the roof of any hostel/mess is prohibited.
Hostel timings: Boys not allowed outside from 8:00 PM to 4:30 AM, Girls not allowed outside from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM.
During vacations, girls are not allowed outside from 5:00 PM to 7:00 AM.
Hostellers with backlog exams should follow specific stay rules during vacations.
A late entry register will be maintained; penalties can be imposed for repeated late entries.
Occupants are liable for intentional damage to hostel property.
Misuse of water, electricity, and other facilities is liable to disciplinary action.
Hostellers are responsible for their valuable belongings.
Strictly adhere to mess timings.
Do not waste food in the mess.
Report maintenance complaints in the complaint register.
Playing outdoor games inside the hostel is strictly prohibited.
Punishment for rule violations can include fines, expulsion from the hostel, or academic suspension.
Parents/guardians must agree to a fixed deposit bond of ₹50,000 for misconduct, which may not be refunded.
